nodes.text: Smoking was a recreational drug activity in the galaxy. It involved using dried tobacco or similar inhalants like tabac or t'bac, lighting it, and then absorbing the smoke via the nostrils or similar organs. Other drugs could also be smoked through a water pipe. Smoking was sometimes considered bothersome to the public, and for this reason was frequently banned from public areas or companies, including flights for the travel agency Star Tours.
